datetime.timeSynchonization.tooltip: Select time synchronization or manual time settings

datetime.ntpServer.tooltip: NTP server name or IP address
datetime.ntp.invalidHost.error: Invalid host name or IP address
datetime.notificationTimezone.error: Error while reading time zone data:
datetime.differBrowserCtrlx: Date or time of ctrlX OS differs from your browser by more than one minute
datetime.saveError: Saving not possible because of invalid user input
datetime.clockWindbackHint: Please note that setting the clock back for more than 24 hours invalidates time-based licenses.
datetime.clockWindbackHint2: To reactivate the licenses, contact your support representative.

ntpSettings.title: NTP settings
ntpSettings.pollInterval.hint: Polling for NTP messages starts at the minimum poll interval, and is adjusted within the specified limits in response to received packets.

report.common.message.currentlyBeingCreated: System report is currently being created
report.dlg.main.additionalInfo.hint: Enter additional information for recipient to be included in file 'readme.txt'.
report.dlg.main.additionalInfo.title: Additional information
report.dlg.main.options.activeAppData.hint: App data might contain application and user related information.
System report incomplete. Remedy: Log in as administrator or, at least, update 'Setup' app (>= v1.18).
System report incomplete: Error reading user permissions.
report.dlg.main.options.hint: Select logbook messages and resources to be added to the system report.

report.dlg.main.security.hint: Enter password to encrypt system report.
report.dlg.main.security.password.label: Password
report.dlg.main.security.title: Security
report.dlg.main.title: Create system report
report.dlg.notIncludedData.details: Due to limited user permissions, the following data is not included in the system report:
report.dlg.notIncludedData.title: System report incomplete
report.dlg.progress.title: Creating system report...
report.dlg.protocol.partialSuccess: System report file {{file}} created with {{errorCount}} error(s) and {{warningCount}} warning(s).
report.dlg.protocol.title: Protocol

shutdown.warning: The system will shut down. Ensure that all appliances are in safe state before proceeding!
shutdown.authorization.error: You are not authorized to perfom this action
shutdown.shutDownHint2: The system can't be reached anymore. You can close this browser window now.

firmware-update.info1: To update the device firmware, provide a system image file.
firmware-update.info2: Optionally provide a setup file to initialize the device with settings and resources after the update.
firmware-update.info3: The files are uploaded to the device and temporarily stored on an external storage medium.
firmware-update.info5: This medium is made bootable and repartitioned. All data on this medium is lost!
firmware-update.info4: After the upload the device reboots automatically to perform the update. The uploaded files are deleted afterwards.
firmware-update.firmware-file.label: System image
firmware-update.firmware-file.error: Please select a system image file
firmware-update.setup-file.label: Setup file (optional)
firmware-update.setup-file.hint: Password protected files are not supported
firmware-update.target.label: Medium for temporary storage
firmware-update.target.error: The update requires an external storage medium to be attached
firmware-update.target.hint: For this device the medium has to be attached to USB port XF01C
firmware-update.file.placeholder: Click here to select a file
firmware-update.warning.title: Perform firmware update?
firmware-update.warning.text: If you continue, all your settings, apps and data on the device and on the extension of the system data (if present) are lost! Media mounted for data exchange are not affected.
firmware-update.warning.text2: All data on the external storage "{{media}}" is lost!
firmware-update.progress.title: Preparing firmware update
firmware-update.progress.prepareMedium: Preparing medium for temporary storage. This might take several minutes
firmware-update.service-state.callout: The system is currently in the state {{state}}. To update the firmware, switch to the state "Service" in the header.
firmware-update.not-supported: This device does not support firmware updates

updating.title: Updating firmware...
updating.text1: The device is now rebooting and updating the firmware. This may take up to 30 minutes.
updating.text2: Do not power off the device until the process is finished!
updating.text3: The device is not reachable during the update.
updating.text4: After the update, use the default network settings or the ones provided by the setup file to reach the device.
updating.text5: We are trying to reconnect automatically.
updating.text6: If this does not work, please connect manually either by using
updating.textConnectByDhcp: the IP address assigned by the DHCP server
updating.textConnectByHostname: an IP address or the host name from the setup file

factoryReset.goToStorageHint: Click | here | to format and mount media.
factoryReset.target.error: To reset the device, mount a FAT32-formatted medium with sufficient space for data exchange.
factoryReset.text1: This will reset the device to its initial state:
factoryReset.text2: All settings are reset to their default values.
factoryReset.text3: All apps installed by the user are removed.
factoryReset.text4: Certificates and keys in the "Permanent Storage" remain.
factoryReset.text5: Preinstalled apps remain in their current version.
factoryReset.appsNotInstalledText: These apps are no longer installed and are not restored during reset:
factoryReset.appsInstalledText: These apps will be installed after the reset:

mediumReqs.text2: This medium does not have to be empty and data on that medium will be preserved.
mediumReqs.text1: To prepare the reset, approximately {{requiredSpace}} of data has to be stored on the FAT32-formatted medium mounted for data exchange.

factoryReset.processHint1: When starting the reset, all necessary data is copied to the selected medium.
factoryReset.processHint2: The device will reboot and perform the reset. This may take up to 30 minutes.
factoryReset.processHint3: Do not power off the device until the reset is finished!

resetWarning.title: Reset device?
resetWarning.description: If you continue, the device is reset and all your apps and settings are lost. This cannot be undone.

resetting.title: Resetting device data...
resetting.text1: The device is now rebooting and resetting device data. This may take up to 30 minutes.
resetting.text2: Do not power off the device until the process is finished!
resetting.text3: The device is not reachable during the reset.
resetting.text4: After the reset, use the default network settings to reach the device.
resetting.text5: We are trying to reconnect automatically.
resetting.text6: If this does not work, please connect manually either by using
resetting.textConnectByDhcp: the IP address assigned by the DHCP server
